2025-05-15.title: X advertisers from Nestle to Shell deny Musk’s boycott claims
2025-05-15.description: Advertisers say they didn’t coordinate an ad boycott of Elon Musk’s X following his purchase of the social media platform. Find out more

2025-05-15.title: Shell Paid Nigeria More Tax Than Any Other Country In 2024
2025-05-15.description: Shell Plc paid $5.34 billion in taxes and other charges to Nigeria in 2024, more than any other country.

2025-05-08.title: BP-Shell Megadeal Would Create European Rival to Exxon Mobil
2025-05-08.description: If Shell Plc were to acquire BP Plc, it would be among the largest deals in European history, creating for the first time a European oil major that could challenge industry leaders Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp.

2025-05-13.title: Intel Certifies Shell Lubricant for Cooling AI Data Centers
